title: Nichole Wood's new tradie boyfriend takes a swipe at Channel 10
text:
Nichole Wood's rumoured new tradie boyfriend, Jake Yard, has taken a swipe at Channel 10.

The construction worker took to Instagram on Monday to share a snap of himself cuddling up to the former Bachelor star on a boat, when he took the dig.

'Roses are red, violets are blue, I promise to give more roses than Channel Ten did to you,' Jake captioned the snap.

'Roses are red, violets are blue': Nichole Wood's new tradie boyfriend Jake Yard takes a swipe at Channel 10 as he cuddles up to the bikini-clad Bachelor star

He added hashtags including 'poses win the roses' and 'not bad'.

Nichole saw the funny side and commented underneath: 'F**k I love you hahahahaha.'

In the snap, Nichole showed off her flawless figure in a tiny string bikini.

Claim to fame: Nichole rose to fame on The Bachelor this year, failing to find love with astrophysicist Matt Agnew

Jake meanwhile goes shirtless wearing a pair of colourful board shorts.

Nichole rose to fame on The Bachelor this year, failing to find love with astrophysicist Matt Agnew.

Last week, Nichole shared a snap of herself cosying up to Jake in bed as they did a face mask.

Going strong! Last week, Nichole shared a snap of herself cosying up to Jake in bed as they did a face mask

'Having a self care night with this one @jakeeyard,' Nichole captioned the shot, followed by two love-heart emojis.

Jake, who owns his own company Jake Yard Constructions, later posted the same snap to his own feed - seemingly confirming the pair are an item.

A friend of Nichole's confirmed to Daily Mail Australia that the couple are very much together.

'Nichole was looking for something more organic and real, and she's found that with Jake,' said the pal.

'Nichole was looking for something more organic and real': A friend of Nichole's confirmed to Daily Mail Australia that the couple are very much together

'She doesn't care about the reality TV world and Instagram fame. She just wanted to find somebody normal and genuine.'

Her new romance may come as a surprise to fans, as just weeks ago she was believed to be dating Married At First Sight hunk Billy Vincent.

The pair were first linked together back in August, after being pictured sharing a very steamy smooch on the street - while The Bachelor was still on air.

But just one month later, Nichole admitted that the duo had called it quits during a live Q and A with fans.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted 10 for comment in relation to this story.
description: Nichole Wood's rumoured new tradie boyfriend, Jake Yard, has taken a swipe at Channel 10.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
